Description.Text: Location This tastefully designed hotel is located in Oia and surrounded by numerous restaurants and bars. For further variety there are also nightclubs and a beautiful beach to relax on (roughly 10 km away). The closest shops are around 2 km away and the nearest train station is roughly 50 km from the hotel. Facilities The hotel is pleased to welcome travellers in the 2 suites, 3 single and 55 double rooms. At the establishment, guests are welcomed at the reception area with 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-in/check-out service. The upper floors of the accommodation can be accessed by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a café, a bar, a playroom, room service, a laundry service and a conference room. Children can have a great time playing in the playground. Guests with their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Rooms Rooms feature central heating and a bathroom. Little extras, including a telephone, a TV, a radio and a stereo system, contribute to a great stay. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A dip in the swimming pool is great for getting into the holiday spirit. Sun loungers and parasols are ideal for relaxation. A range of options are available, including tennis and a gym. Meals Travellers can choose from a range of snacks and meals including breakfast, lunch or dinner. Drinks are included in the price for guests. Payment All major credit cards, including VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.
